mix.mixcheckdata: select contributor,name from customscan_contributor_attributes where module='cslastfm' and attr='similarartist' limit 1

menu.playdata: select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks join contributor_track on contributor_track.track=tracks.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) join contributors on contributors.id=contributor_track.contributor left join customscan_contributor_attributes as attr1 on attr1.contributor=contributors.id and attr1.module='cslastfm' and attr1.attr='similarartist' left join customscan_contributor_attributes as attr2 on attr2.value=contributors.name and attr2.module='cslastfm' and attr2.attr='similarartist' where audio=1 and ((attr1.id is not null and exists(select id from contributors where attr1.value=contributors.name and contributors.id={baseartist})) or (attr2.id is not null and attr2.contributor={baseartist}) or contributors.id={baseartist}) group by tracks.id order by rand() limit {custombrowse.mixsize}

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks join contributor_track on contributor_track.track=tracks.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) where audio=1 and contributor_track.contributor={artist} group by tracks.id order by rand() limit {custombrowse.mixsize}
menu.menudata: select contributors.id,contributors.name,substr(contributors.namesort,1,1) from contributors left join customscan_contributor_attributes as attr1 on attr1.contributor={baseartist} and attr1.module='cslastfm' and attr1.attr='similarartist' and attr1.value=contributors.name left join customscan_contributor_attributes as attr2 on attr2.module='cslastfm' and attr2.attr='similarartist' and attr2.contributor=contributors.id where attr1.id is not null or (attr2.id is not null and exists (select id from contributors where contributors.id={baseartist} and contributors.name=attr2.value)) or contributors.id={baseartist} group by contributors.id order by contributors.namesort asc

menu.playdata: select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks join contributor_track on contributor_track.track=tracks.id and contributor_track.role in (1,5) where audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and contributor_track.contributor={artist} group by tracks.id order by rand() limit {custombrowse.mixsize}

menu.menudata: select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,contributor_track,albums where tracks.audio=1 and contributor_track.track=tracks.id and tracks.album={album} and contributor_track.contributor={artist} group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
